Retrieve Music on Hold files from CUCM and stream from router flash

29 Aug 2010 #cisco

This is a brief explanation of how to retrieve the MoH or Music on Hold files from Cisco Unified Communications Manager 7 and load the files into a router’s flash for remote-site streaming directly from the router.

Cisco CME join and leave tones for a MeetMe Conference

15 Jul 2010 #cisco

MeetMe conferencing with Call Manager Express allows a CME phone to go off hook, press the MeetMe softkey, and dial the MeetMe bridge number to start a conference. Any other CME subscriber or off-net party may dial the MeetMe number to join the conference.

Read more...

Cisco CUBE and modifying SIP diversion with SIP profiles

05 Jul 2010 #cisco #cube

When configuring a SIP Trunk with CUCM to a SIP Service Provider it is best practice to use an SBC or Session Border Controller such as CUBE (Cisco Unified Border Element) between CUCM and the provider’s SIP Trunk. One benefit is this automatically alleviates the challenges most IP PBX’s face with hosted nat traversal specific to SIP and RTP.

Read more...

Broadsoft Extreme Overload Controls

27 May 2010 #broadworks #sbc #sip

The BroadWorks platform uses an enhanced algorithm called Overload Control to offer protection when a cluster node is under severe conditions. The goal is that during an overload period of 150% the throughput will be no less than 90%.

Read more...
